definition: to pay back in full/to redeem a debt
still/still in progress/still more/yet/even more/in addition/fairly/passably (good)/as early as/even/also/else
Qing or Ch'ing dynasty of imperial China (1644-1911)/surname Qing
clear/distinct/quiet/just and honest/pure/to settle or clear up/to clean up or purge

sentences.english: It also wipes out the system restore with a reset, making it harder to recover the system.
sentences.chinese: 它还清除掉系统还原设置，使其难以恢复系统。

sentences.english: Pay off all high interest debt, such as credit cards.
sentences.chinese: 还清所有高利息的债务，例如信用卡。

sentences.english: Most of the money that Addie received was automatically used to pay off the previous loan;
sentences.chinese: 艾迪所得到的钱大多数被自动地用于还清前面的债务。

sentences.english: Co-incidentally, Leo paid off his debt at the exact same time. I didn’t pay off my debt overnight.
sentences.chinese: 并且，里奥也差不多在同时还清了他的债务。
我已经还清了所有的债务。

sentences.english: We should manage to square accounts with the bank.
sentences.chinese: 我们应该设法还清银行的欠帐。

sentences.english: If you owe more money than ever was created you can never pay it back.
sentences.chinese: 如果你欠的钱比创造的钱更多，你就绝没可能还清。

sentences.english: But all three of them are saddled with debts they can’t possibly repay.
sentences.chinese: 但是这三个国家都背负了他们不可能还清的债务。

sentences.english: Right after that, he paid off the debt - and cancelled the credit card.
sentences.chinese: 还清债务后，他便注销了信用卡。

sentences.english: I began now gradually to pay off the debt I was under for the printing-house.
sentences.chinese: 现在我开始逐步地还清我为了创办印刷所而借的债款。

sentences.english: You can just get a loan out and pay it all at the end.
sentences.chinese: 你可以贷款，最后再还清。

sentences.english: Americans repaid loans or defaulted; they spent less and saved more.
sentences.chinese: 美国人一时间快速还清借款和欠款，少消费而多储蓄。

sentences.english: I have started college funds for both of my young nieces.
sentences.chinese: 我还清了一些债务，为我的两个侄女建立了大学基金。

sentences.english: He discharged all his debts before he went abroad.
sentences.chinese: 他出国前还清了所有债务。

sentences.english: A month elapsed before he coughed up the money he owed me.
sentences.chinese: 一个月之后他才勉台地把欠我的钱还清。

sentences.english: This is what the world can pay off, in addition to Parents.
sentences.chinese: 这世界什么东西都能还清，除了天下父母心。

definition: to repay/to pay off a debt
to owe a debt/the sum owed
to pay in full/to pay all of a bill/to pay off
a loan/CL:筆|笔[bi3]/to provide a loan (e.g. bank)/to raise a loan (from e.g. a bank)
